(Original) Cute place to wander around for about an hour worth of activities. Price is quite high for the amount of time you spend in there, especially of you‚Äôre visiting in a weekend where it‚Äôs busier. Tons to do around Icon park before and after. Bring your patience for the parking garage on weekends.

topComments.author: Crystal Samuels

H√° tantas oportunidades para fotos e muitos funcion√°rios para ajud√°-lo. Um dos membros da equipe realmente me mostrou como usar alguns recursos interessantes na minha pr√≥pria c√¢mera. Estacionamos gratuitamente no estacionamento coberto e nos divertimos por cerca de uma hora aqui.  (Original) I purchased Go City passes & my family decided to go through this museum.  It is so cute! There are so many photo opportunities and plenty of staff there to help you. One of the staff members actually showed me how to use some cool features on my own camera. We went on a Thursday at 1pm so there were no lines and it was not crowded. We did make a reservation, but they did take walk in. Ill definitely have to take some friends here....

topComments.author: Irmarie Govind
topComments.comment: What an amazing attraction!!! It was so much fun visiting the different rooms and taking pictures all together. Super friendly staff, they even assist taking pictures for you and your group.  Located at the ICON Park. A great experience for the entire family!!!!

topComments.author: Elena Christinne

topComments.author: Ann Michelle Artwork
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Tivemos um tempo incr√≠vel! Quer√≠amos experimentar algo novo al√©m de um parque da Disney ou Universal Studios. Este lugar fazia parte do Icon Park, que consiste em v√°rias barracas de comida, museus menores, lojas, pequenos passeios, etc. O Illusions Musem foi muito √∫nico e divertido de experimentar. √â para todas as idades, crian√ßas e adultos. Toda a sua arte s√£o ilus√µes de √≥tica interativas ou ilus√µes de √≥tica que podem ser vistas com base em sua posi√ß√£o ou em como voc√™ se move ao redor delas. Todas as obras de arte t√™m uma biografia e/ou diretiva. Fomos em casal e conseguimos tirar todas as fotos, mas algumas seriam honestamente mais divertidas com um grupo maior, ent√£o recomendo ir com um grupo maior de 3 ou mais para uma experi√™ncia ainda melhor. Se voc√™ for sozinho, eles t√™m muitos funcion√°rios para tirar suas fotos e dar muitas ideias legais, se necess√°rio. Toda a caminhada ao redor do museu pode levar de 10 a 30 minutos, dependendo de quantas obras de arte voc√™ escolher para interagir ou parar e tirar fotos. Eles far√£o voc√™ esperar na entrada quando voc√™ entrar pela primeira vez, se estiver lotado (eles fazem uma r√°pida caminhada e verificam e veem)  No geral, nos divertimos muito, nos divertimos muito e temos algumas fotos muito legais para capturar nossa pequena e incr√≠vel aventura!  (Original) We had an awesome time! We wanted to try something new besides a Disney Park or Universal Studios. This place was apart of Icon Park which consists of several food stands, smaller museums, shops, small rides, etc. The Illusions Musem was very unique and fun to experience. It's for all ages, both kids and adults. All of their art is either  interactive optical Illusions or optical illusions that can be seen based off of your position or how you move around them. All artworks has a bio and/or directive.  We went as a couple and were able to take the all of the pictures, but some would honestly be more fun eith a larger group, so I do recommend going with a larger group of 3 or more for an even better experience. If you go by yourself, they have plenty of employees to to take your pictures and give you plenty of cool ideas if needed. The whole walk around the museum could take 10-30+ minutes depending on how many artwork you choose to interact with or stop and take pictures with. They will have you wait at the entrance when you first come in if it is to crowded (they do a quick walk through and check and see)  Overall we really enjoyed ourselves, had a lot of fun, and we have some really cool pictures to capture our awesome little adventure!

(Original) This is a fun spot to take pictures. I highly recommend to purchase your tickets in advance to avoid any lines available. The staff is really nice and they are willing to take pictures of you in case you need it. There are a bunch of rooms but I left with the sense of wanting more rooms. It‚Äôs really fun and a fun date idea. This can be fun for youth and adults. They have a store where you can get merch, my shirt got dirty with my breakfast so I bought one there (the one I‚Äôm wearing).

(Original) I was in Orlando for business recently and decided to come here to take a couple of fun photos. I was alone and thought I would have to use a tripod but the staff kindly offered to help. I had two help me initially, then I was introduced to Zack who - after agreeing to stand in for a photo with me - stuck around the rest of my time there. He was extremely friendly, helpful, and thoughtful, and gave great suggestions for posing. My photos turned out so much better than I imagined.
